CHAT.comment: BUCKMAN COMPANY, Petitioner v. PLAINTIFFS' LEGAL COMMITTEE
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH S. GELLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF IRVING L. GORNSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL D. FISHBEIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH S. GELLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:00 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
